main.name: Sundeep Kakar
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree focused in Computer Science and minor in Math from Purdue School of Science and a second minor in Business from Kelley School of Business at IUPUI. I specialize in FullStack development involving ReactJS+Firebase/MongoDB and Laravel+PHP stacks. I am passionate about FrontEnd design and building Web Applications (and Native applicationsðŸ˜‰). Check out my Work!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: My skills have a primary focus in Web Dev in Python, NodeJS, ReactJS and Native Development in React-Native

education.description: Bachelors of Sciences in Computer Science. Double Minor in Math and Business (Kelley School of Business @ IUPUI).

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Develop Web Apps using PHP, WCMS. Build user interfaces using the IU Framework. Interact with clients to produce and deploy web apps. Maintain, update, and troubleshoot IU Framework & ASP.NET websites. Perform database(MySQL) maintenance and updates.

work.title: Teaching Assistant & Peer Leader
work.description: Teaching Assistant for CSCI 23000 - Computing 1, a 110+ student course. Lead recitations and discussions covering Python, APIs, and Web Apps (Bottle.py|SQL). Graded assignments, quizzes and final projects.

work.title: Technical Center Consultant
work.description: Provided direct technical assistance relating to software, hardware and computer peripherals. Assist campus instructors, customers, and campus housing residents.

work.title: Quantitative Trainer and Student Counselor
work.description: Over the course of this internship, I presented an academic course on the SAT Quantitative section, created and maintained documents/questionnaires, assisted and counseled 20+ students during the internship, and mentored potential international freshman about college transition.

skills.name: Languages
skills.description: JavaScript (NodeJS), Python, C/C++, PHP, Java, HTML5, CSS

skills.name: Frameworks
skills.description: ReactJS, React-Native, Laravel(PHP), Django, VueJS, Flask

projects.title: Stylus
projects.category: A Start-Up Company in the Development that aims to make the Online Shopping experience better. The mobile-first application is written from scratch in React-Native

projects.title: PlaceHoldr
projects.category: Roommate LookUp Made Easy! The purpose of this application is to build an online roommate matching system that allows for studentsliving in off-campus housing to find other roommates with similar preferences.

projects.title: Django Steganography App
projects.category: Django Web App to learn about Steganography through implementation.  It covers most types of steganography (text, image, and audio).

projects.title: Driving Survival Game
projects.category: HTML5 Game Written in Phaser JS to bring awareness to the dangers of 'Texting and Driving' through a different approach

projects.title: Data Science Blog
projects.category: Data Science Blog based on me and my family's texting patterns. The data was aggregated using Whatsapp Message History.

projects.title: IoT Theft Detection System
projects.category: Theft Detection System that utilizes computer-vision based motion detection on a Raspberry Pi over constant video feed from a remote camera module. The system operates over a CoAS server ideal for IoT implementations.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
